info.title: Zvanu Parvaldnieks
info.description: Zvanu Parvaldnieks is a mobile virtual PBX service for LMT mobile subscribers. This connector lets users to easily send all the data and events about calls, voicemails, contacts and configuration to other services.

x-ms-notification-content.description: Provides event with data payload about the call when event CallstartedEvent is received during the start of the call.

get.description: Retrieve a single employee object by providing an ID.

parameters.name: contact_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the employee.

get.description: Retrieve a single employee group object by providing an ID.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the employee group.

get.description: Retrieve a single call recording by providing an ID.

parameters.name: record_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the recording.

get.description: Retrieve Call recordings. Additionally API consumer may filter the returned records based on a specific number or employee involved in the call (source, destination, or contact_id), as well as direction to filter out only incoming or outgoing calls or only calls made within a specified date range (date_range).

parameters.name: record_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the recording.

parameters.name: initial_record_id
parameters.description: Initial record ID for querying only newly created records.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit how many results to retrieve.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Used to specify from which result we want the data to retrieve.

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: The number which call was placed to.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: The number of calling party.

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: "in" or "out" to indicate if the call was incoming or outgoing.

parameters.name: contact_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the Employee involved in the call.

parameters.name: date_from
parameters.description: Starting date in the filtered date range.

parameters.name: date_to
parameters.description: End date in the filtered date range.

get.x-ms-trigger-hint: Triggers when a new call recording is created

get.description: Retrieve Call history entries. Additionally API consumer may filter the returned records based on a specific number or employee involved in the call (source, destination, or contact_id), as well as direction to filter out only incoming or outgoing calls or only calls made within a specified date range (date_range).

parameters.name: call_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the call.

parameters.name: initial_call_id
parameters.description: Initial call ID for querying only newly created calls.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit how many results to retrieve.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Used to specify from which result we want the data to retrieve.

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: The number which call was placed to.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: The number of calling party.

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: "in" or "out" to indicate if the call was incoming or outgoing.

parameters.name: contact_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the Employee involved in the call.

parameters.name: date_from
parameters.description: Starting date in the filtered date range.

parameters.name: date_to
parameters.description: End date in the filtered date range.

get.x-ms-trigger-hint: Triggers when a new call is registered.

get.description: Retrieve a list of created voicemail boxes.

parameters.name: box_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the voicemail box.

parameters.name: initial_box_id
parameters.description: Initial voicemail box ID for querying only newly created voicemail boxes.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit how many results to retrieve.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Used to specify from which result we want the data to retrieve.

get.x-ms-trigger-hint: Triggers when a new voicemail box is created

get.description: Retrieve Voicemail messages. Additionally API consumer may filter the returned records based on contact_id, source, box_id, or date_range to limit the result to only those messages that are left for a specific employee, voicemail box, from a specific number, or within a requested date range.

parameters.name: voicemail_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the voicemail message.

parameters.name: initial_voicemail_id
parameters.description: Initial voicemail ID for querying only newly created voicemails.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit how many results to retrieve.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Used to specify from which result we want the data to retrieve.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: The number of calling party.

parameters.name: contact_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the Employee.

parameters.name: box_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the voicemail box.

parameters.name: date_from
parameters.description: Starting date in the filtered date range.

parameters.name: date_to
parameters.description: End date in the filtered date range.

get.x-ms-trigger-hint: Checks for new voicemail is created.

parameters.name: prompt_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the audio prompt.

parameters.name: initial_prompt_id
parameters.description: Initial audio prompt ID for querying only newly created audio prompts.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit how many results to retrieve.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Used to specify from which result we want the data to retrieve.

get.x-ms-trigger-hint: Triggers when a new audio prompt is created

parameters.name: endpoint_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the VoIP endpoint.

parameters.name: initial_endpoint_id
parameters.description: Initial VoIP endpoint ID for querying only newly created VoIP endpoints.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit how many results to retrieve.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Used to specify from which result we want the data to retrieve.

get.x-ms-trigger-hint: Triggers when a new VoIP endpoint is created

get.summary: Get Call History Item By ID
get.description: Retrieve a single call history entry by providing an ID.

parameters.name: call_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the call.

get.description: Retrieve a single voicemail box object by providing an ID.

parameters.name: box_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the voicemail box.

get.description: Retrieve a single voicemail object by providing an ID.

parameters.name: voicemail_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the voicemail.

get.description: Retrieve a single audio prompt object by providing an ID.

parameters.name: prompt_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the audio prompt.

get.description: Retrieve a single VoIP endpoint object by providing an ID.

parameters.name: endpoint_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the VoIP endpoint.

post.description: Request the start of new call by sending a request to a device.

delete.description: Delete a single webhook object by providing an ID.

parameters.name: webhook_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the webhook.

x-ms-notification-content.description: Provides event with data payload about the call when event CallConnectedEvent is received during a moment when the call is answered.

post.description: Provides event with data payload about the call when event CallConnectedEvent is received during a moment when the call is answered.

x-ms-notification-content.description: Provides event with data payload about the call when event CallCompletedEvent is received during a moment when the call has ended.

post.description: Provides event with data payload about the call when event CallCompletedEvent is received during a moment when the call has ended.

x-ms-notification-content.description: Provides event with data payload about the voicemail when VoicemailCreated event is received during a moment when a caller has left a voicemail.

post.description: Provides event with data payload about the voicemail when VoicemailCreated event is received during a moment when a caller has left a voicemail.

x-ms-notification-content.description: Provides event with data payload about the voicemail when VoicemailDeleted event is received during a moment when a user has deleted a voicemail message.

post.description: Provides event with data payload about the voicemail when VoicemailDeleted event is received during a moment when a user has deleted a voicemail message.

x-ms-notification-content.description: Provides event with data payload data about the call when LostCallerCreated event is received during a moment when the call does not get answered and gets registered as lost.

post.description: Provides event with data payload data about the call when LostCallerCreated event is received during a moment when the call does not get answered and gets registered as lost.

x-ms-notification-content.description: Provides event with data payload data about the call when LostCallerUpdated event is received during a moment when another unsuccessful call attempt is received from the same number, so lost call record attempts and last_contact fields get updated with a new number and timestamp.

post.description: Provides event with data payload data about the call when LostCallerUpdated event is received during a moment when another unsuccessful call attempt is received from the same number, so lost call record attempts and last_contact fields get updated with a new number and timestamp.

x-ms-notification-content.description: Provides event with data payload about the call when LostCallerDeleted event is received during a moment when lost call gets called back from employee or gets answered later in repeated call from the same caller.

post.description: Provides event with data payload about the call when LostCallerDeleted event event is received during a moment when lost call gets called back from employee or gets answered later in repeated call from the same caller.

x-ms-notification-content.description: Provides event with data payload about the call when CallRecorded event is received during a moment when call recording gets created.

post.description: Provides event with data payload about the call when CallRecorded event is received during a moment when call recording gets created.

x-ms-notification-content.description: Provides event with data payload about the call when CallTransfered event is received during a moment when the call gets transferred to a third party either by a blind transfer of attended transfer.

post.description: Provides event with data payload about the call when CallTransfered event is received during a moment when the call gets transferred to a third party either by a blind transfer of attended transfer.

x-ms-notification-content.description: Provides event with data payload about the call when event CallStarted event is received during the start of the call.

post.description: Provides event with data payload about the call when event CallStarted event is received during the start of the call.

get.description: Retrieve Employee groups data. Additionally API consumer may filter the returned records based on contact_id, to limit the result to only those groups, which have a particular Employee as a member.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the group.

parameters.name: initial_group_id
parameters.description: Initial group ID for querying only newly created employee groups.

parameters.name: contact_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the Employee.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit how many results to retrieve.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Used to specify from which result we want the data to retrieve.

get.x-ms-trigger-hint: Triggers when a new employee group is created

get.description: Triggers when a new employee is created

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit how many results to retrieve.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Used to specify from which result we want the data to retrieve.

parameters.name: contact_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the Employee.

parameters.name: initial_contact_id
parameters.description: Initial contact ID for querying only newly created employees.

get.x-ms-trigger-hint: Triggers when a new employee is created

get.description: Retrieve all lost call records from call history that have not been answered, have been called back or the caller has not reached the employee in repeated attempts within the same day.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit how many results to retrieve.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Used to specify from which result we want the data to retrieve.

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: The number which call was placed to.

parameters.name: date_from
parameters.description: Starting date in the filtered date range.

parameters.name: date_to
parameters.description: End date in the filtered date range.
